title: AI-Driven Personalization Engine
description: Our LLM-based engine analyzes your event text to infer tone, style, and essential logistics automatically. Just paste a message and get a design.

title: High-Speed Bulk Rendering
description: Leverage a cluster of headless browsers to generate hundreds of invitations simultaneously without quality loss. Perfect for last-minute changes.

title: Context-Aware Design Logic
description: Our AI understands if your event is formal, casual, or themed (e.g., 'Retro 80s') and applies the perfect font palette automatically.

title: Smart Guest Management
description: Upload any messy CSV and our system will clean, format, and prepare every name for rendering.

title: Cross-Platform Export
description: Get high-res PNGs for Instagram, PDFs for printing, or optimized JPEGs for email. Your invites, your way.
